#summary When an input element has type=image, it represents a clickable image control that submits a web form.
#labels about-html,about-forms,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *input type=image element*

== Usage ==

{{{
<input type="image" src="images/button.png" alt="search" value="search" />
}}}
